line_1: Sad fleeting Ghosts with Art constrain
line_2: Back to a kinder Life again.

line_1: The Love of CHRIST does me constrain
line_2: To seek the wandring Souls of Men:

line_1: Now when ripe Nature will the Birth constrain,
line_2: The teeming Bride feels her increasing Pain;

line_1: With stubborn Squeeze the tortur'd Parts constrain,
line_2: And with firm Braces fix the rounding Chain.

line_1: Nor let their force thy gentleness constrain
line_2: Here let his faithful services remain

line_1: Our wives and sisters in our sight constrain;
line_2: While we, regardless of the shameful stain,

line_1: Our wives and sisters in our sight constrain;
line_2: Stand tamely by, and scarce of wrong complain?
